The Premium 6-Port USB Charging Hub

Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0

38% more efficient than the previous Quick Charge 2.0, Qualcomm Quick Charge 3.0 might be one of the most efficient USB charging technology in the world. 



Anker's Fast-Charging Technology

Five ports equipped with Anker's exclusive PowerIQ and VoltageBoost technologies provide the fastest possible charge for non-Quick Charge devices, delivering up to 2.4 amps per port.


Premium Components

PowerPort+ 6 showcases a sleek and robust aluminum-alloy faceplate. The brushed metal provides high-level protection with a premium look and feel. 


MultiProtect Safety System

Surge protection, temperature control and more advanced safety features keep you and your devices safe.

For Optimal Use:

• Use your original cable or a third-party-certified one (such as MFi).

• To ensure better performance, we strongly recommend charging your iPad pro via the PowerIQ ports (5V/2.4A max).

• For Nexus 5X and 6P, only regular charging speed is possible using a USB-A to USB-C cable.

Quick Charge 3.0 60W 6-Port USB Wall Charge for Galaxy S7 / S6 / Edge / Plus, Note 5 / 4 and PowerIQ for iPhone 7 / 6s / Plus, iPad Pro / Air 2 / mini, LG, Nexus, HTC and More


  • Input :100-240V~1.4A 50-60Hz
  • QC2.0 Output :5V==2.4A, 9V==2A, 12V==1.5A
  • PowerIQ Output :5V==8.4A (2.4A max each port)
